external_games.name: Five Nights on the Toilet: Number 2

name: Five Nights on the Toilet: Number 2
storyline:
You have returned to Freddy's to finish the job. No one can stand in your way any longer. You will bring about the true end of Freddy's.

You are William Afton, the one behind the clogs. You have returned to the abandoned Freddy's location to fulfill your ultimate mission before the location is salvaged. But most of the animatronics know your goal, and will stop at nothing to keep themselves free of a septic flood. Can you survive another five nights on the toilet?
summary:
A comedy parody of the Five Nights at Freddy's indie horror series, and the sequel to Five Nights on the Toilet.

Survive five nights upon a toilet in an abandoned Freddy Fazbear's location, and investigate what events brought the story to where it is now.

Features first person sit and survive horror gameplay, with many levels, secrets, and challenges.
